00017 EditorManager::EditorManager(AppManager* appManager) : GameManager(appManager)
00018 {
00019     m_selectedNode = NULL;
00020 
00021     m_FFCamera = new scene::FreeFlyCamera;
00022     m_FFCamera->SetSpeed(4);
00023     manager.scene->AddCamera(m_FFCamera);
00024 
00025     m_OCamera = new scene::OrbitalCamera;
00026     manager.scene->AddCamera(m_OCamera);
00027 
00028     m_camera = m_OCamera;
00029 
00030     m_timeTo = VIEW;
00031 
00032     m_navigation = ENTITY;
00033 
00034     parallelscene.newton->SetEnable(false);
00035 
00036     m_completeHelp = false;
00037 }

00050 void EditorManager::SetupMap(const Settings::EditSetting& editSetting)
00051 {
00052     m_editSetting = editSetting;
00053 
00054     m_fog = manager.scene->GetFog();
00055     m_sky = manager.scene->GetSkybox();
00056 
00057     if(m_editSetting.createNew)
00058     {
00059         map.name = "NewMap";
00060         m_selectedLight = NULL;
00061     }
00062 
00063     else
00064     {
00065         manager.level->LoadLevel(m_editSetting.editMap.file);
00066 
00067         parallelscene.newton->SetWorldSize(map.aabb);
00068 
00069         m_allEntity.reserve(map.staticObjects.size() + map.dynamicObjects.size() + map.items.size());
00070         m_allEntity.insert(m_allEntity.end(), map.staticObjects.begin(), map.staticObjects.end());
00071         m_allEntity.insert(m_allEntity.end(), map.dynamicObjects.begin(), map.dynamicObjects.end());
00072         m_allEntity.insert(m_allEntity.end(), map.items.begin(), map.items.end());
00073 
00074         m_selectedLight = map.lights.empty() ? NULL : map.lights.front();
00075 
00076         manager.scene->SetZFar(m_fog->IsEnable() ? m_fog->GetEnd() : map.aabb.GetSize() * 2);
00077         manager.scene->UpdateViewParameter();
00078     }
00079 
00080     m_axes = new scene::Axes(parallelscene.meshs, 2, 2);
00081     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_axes);
00082 
00083     for(unsigned i = 0; i < map.spawnPoints.size(); i++)
00084     {
00085         StaticObject* visualSpawn = new StaticObject(this, OBJ_SPAWN, map.spawnPoints[i]);
00086 
00087         m_visualSpawnPoints.push_back(visualSpawn);
00088 
00089         NewEntity(visualSpawn);
00090     }
00091 
00092     // PPE ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 
00094     const Settings::Video& vidSets = manager.app->globalSettings.video;
00095 
00096     if(manager.app->globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00097     {
00098         using namespace tbe::ppe;
00099 
00100         ppe.bloom = new BloomEffect;
00101         ppe.bloom->SetRttFrameSize(vidSets.ppe.worldSize);
00102         ppe.bloom->SetIntensity(vidSets.ppe.worldIntensity);
00103         ppe.bloom->SetThreshold(vidSets.ppe.worldThershold);
00104         ppe.bloom->SetBlurPass(vidSets.ppe.worldBlurPass);
00105         manager.ppe->AddPostEffect("worldEffect", ppe.bloom);
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 inline bool MusicCheck(const boost::filesystem::path& filename)
00110 {
00111     string validExt[] = {
00112         ".mp3", ".wav", ".ogg"
00113     };
00114 
00115     string* end = validExt + 3;
00116 
00117     return find(validExt, end, filename.extension()) != end;
00118 }

00380 }
00381 
00382 bool EditorManager::SettingMusicEvent(tbe::EventManager* event)
00383 {
00384     if(!manager.app->globalSettings.noaudio)
00385     {
00386         if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00387         {
00388             if(event->lastActiveKey.first == EventManager::KEY_DELETE)
00389             {
00390                 if(map.musicStream)
00391                     FMOD_Sound_Release(map.musicStream);
00392 
00393                 map.musicChannel = 0;
00394                 map.musicStream = NULL;
00395 
00396                 map.musicPath.clear();
00397 
00398                 hud.music.list->CancelSelection();
00399             }
00400 
00401             if(event->lastActiveKey.first == EventManager::KEY_SPACE)
00402             {
00403                 FMOD_BOOL state = false;
00404                 FMOD_Channel_IsPlaying(map.musicChannel, &state);
00405 
00406                 if(state)
00407                     FMOD_Channel_Stop(map.musicChannel);
00408 
00409                 else
00410                     FMOD_System_PlaySound(manager.fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE,
00411                                           map.musicStream, false, &map.musicChannel);
00412             }
00413         }
00414 
00415         if(hud.music.list->IsActivate())
00416         {
00417             if(map.musicStream)
00418                 FMOD_Sound_Release(map.musicStream);
00419 
00420             map.musicPath = hud.music.list->GetCurrentData().GetValue<string > ();
00421 
00422             FMOD_RESULT res = FMOD_System_CreateStream(manager.fmodsys, map.musicPath.c_str(),
00423                                                        FMOD_LOOP_NORMAL | FMOD_2D | FMOD_HARDWARE,
00424                                                        0, &map.musicStream);
00425 
00426             if(res == FMOD_OK)
00427                 FMOD_System_PlaySound(manager.fmodsys, FMOD_CHANNEL_FREE, map.musicStream, false, &map.musicChannel);
00428 
00429             hud.music.list->SetActivate(false);
00430         }
00431     }
00432 
00433     return false;
00434 }
00435 
00436 bool EditorManager::SettingSkyEvent(tbe::EventManager* event)
00437 {
00438     if(hud.sky.enable->IsActivate())
00439         m_sky->SetEnable(hud.sky.enable->GetCurrent());
00440 
00441     else if(hud.sky.clear->IsActivate())
00442     {
00443         m_sky->Clear();
00444     }
00445 
00446     else if(hud.sky.apply->IsActivate())
00447     {
00448         Texture skyTex[6];
00449 
00450         for(unsigned i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00451         {
00452             string path = hud.sky.face->GetData(i).GetValue<string > ();
00453 
00454             if(!path.empty())
00455                 skyTex[i] = path;
00456         }
00457 
00458         m_sky->SetTextures(skyTex);
00459     }
00460 
00461     else if(hud.sky.list->IsActivate())
00462     {
00463         hud.sky.face->SetData(hud.sky.list->GetCurrentData());
00464     }
00465 
00466     else if(hud.sky.face->IsActivate())
00467     {
00468         hud.sky.list->CancelSelection();
00469     }
00470 
00471     return false;
00472 }
00473 
00474 bool EditorManager::SettingFogEvent(tbe::EventManager* event)
00475 {
00476     if(hud.fog.enable->IsActivate())
00477     {
00478         m_fog->SetEnable(hud.fog.enable->GetCurrent());
00479 
00480         manager.scene->SetZFar(m_fog->IsEnable() ? m_fog->GetEnd() : map.aabb.GetSize());
00481         manager.scene->UpdateViewParameter();
00482     }
00483 
00484     else if(hud.fog.color->IsActivate())
00485         m_fog->SetColor(vec34(hud.fog.color->GetValue()));
00486 
00487     else if(hud.fog.start->IsActivate())
00488     {
00489         m_fog->SetStart(hud.fog.start->GetValue());
00490 
00491         gui::SwitchNumeric<float>::Range* range = new gui::SwitchNumeric<float>::Range(hud.fog.start->GetValue() + 1, 512);
00492 
00493         hud.fog.end->SetRange(range);
00494     }
00495 
00496     else if(hud.fog.end->IsActivate())
00497     {
00498         m_fog->SetEnd(hud.fog.end->GetValue());
00499 
00500         gui::SwitchNumeric<float>::Range* range = new gui::SwitchNumeric<float>::Range(0, hud.fog.end->GetValue() - 1);
00501 
00502         hud.fog.start->SetRange(range);
00503 
00504         manager.scene->SetZFar(m_fog->GetEnd());
00505         manager.scene->UpdateViewParameter();
00506     }
00507 
00508     return false;
00509 }
00510 
00511 void EditorManager::EditEventPorcess(tbe::EventManager* event)
00512 {
00513     if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00514     {
00515         switch(event->lastActiveKey.first)
00516         {
00517             case EventManager::KEY_TAB:
00518                 m_completeHelp = !m_completeHelp;
00519                 break;
00520         }
00521     }
00522 
00523     else if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_DOWN)
00524     {
00525         if(event->mouseState[EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_MIDDLE])
00526         {
00527             manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(true);
00528             manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(false);
00529 
00530             m_timeTo = VIEW;
00531             return;
00532         }
00533         else if(event->mouseState[EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT])
00534         {
00535             if(!map.aabb.IsInner(m_3dSelect))
00536                 m_axes->SetPos(0);
00537 
00538             else
00539                 m_axes->SetPos(m_3dSelect);
00540         }
00541     }
00542 
00543     switch(event->lastActiveKey.first)
00544     {
00545         case EventManager::KEY_F1:
00546             m_navigation = ENTITY;
00547             break;
00548         case EventManager::KEY_F2:
00549             m_navigation = LIGHT;
00550             break;
00551         case EventManager::KEY_F5:
00552             m_navigation = SKYBOX;
00553             break;
00554         case EventManager::KEY_F6:
00555             m_navigation = FOG;
00556             break;
00557         case EventManager::KEY_F7:
00558             m_navigation = MUSIC;
00559             break;
00560     }
00561 
00562     switch(m_navigation)
00563     {
00564         case ENTITY:
00565             if(!SettingEntityEvent(event))
00566                 if(!SelectEntityEvent(event))
00567                     if(!DeleteEntityEvent(event))
00568                         AllocEntityEvent(event);
00569             break;
00570         case LIGHT:
00571             if(!SettingLightEvent(event))
00572                 if(!DeleteLightEvent(event))
00573                     AllocLightEvent(event);
00574             break;
00575 
00576         case SKYBOX:
00577             SettingSkyEvent(event);
00578             break;
00579 
00580         case FOG:
00581             SettingFogEvent(event);
00582             break;
00583 
00584         case MUSIC:
00585             SettingMusicEvent(event);
00586             break;
00587     }
00588 }
00589 
00590 void EditorManager::ViewEventPorcess(tbe::EventManager* event)
00591 {
00592     if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_DOWN)
00593     {
00594         if(event->mouseState[EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_MIDDLE])
00595         {
00596             manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(false);
00597             manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(true);
00598 
00599             m_timeTo = EDIT;
00600             return;
00601         }
00602     }
00603     else if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00604     {
00605         switch(event->lastActiveKey.first)
00606         {
00607             case 'r':
00608                 m_axes->SetPos(0);
00609                 m_OCamera->SetCenter(0);
00610                 m_FFCamera->SetPos(2);
00611                 m_FFCamera->SetTarget(-1);
00612                 m_selectedNode = NULL;
00613                 break;
00614 
00615             case 'v':
00616                 if(m_camera == m_FFCamera)
00617                 {
00618                     m_OCamera->SetPos(m_FFCamera->GetPos());
00619                     m_camera = m_OCamera;
00620                 }
00621                 else
00622                 {
00623                     m_FFCamera->SetPos(m_OCamera->GetPos());
00624                     m_camera = m_FFCamera;
00625                 }
00626 
00627                 manager.scene->SetCurCamera(m_camera);
00628                 break;
00629         }
00630 
00631     }
00632 
00633     m_OCamera->SetCenter(m_axes->GetPos());
00634     m_camera->OnEvent(event);
00635 }
00636 
00637 void EditorManager::GuiEventPorcess(tbe::EventManager* event)
00638 {
00639     if(hud.pause.status->IsEnable() && hud.pause.statusClock.IsEsplanedTime(4000))
00640         hud.pause.status->SetEnable(false);
00641 
00642     if(hud.pause.quit->IsActivate())
00643     {
00644         hud.pause.quit->SetActivate(false);
00645 
00646         if(manager.level->IsChanged() && !hud.pause.confirm)
00647         {
00648             hud.pause.status->SetEnable(true);
00649             hud.pause.status->Write("La Carte a changer !\nEtes vous sure de quitter ?");
00650             hud.pause.confirm = true;
00651         }
00652         else
00653         {
00654             running = false;
00655         }
00656     }
00657     else if(hud.pause.save->IsActivate())
00658     {
00659         hud.pause.save->SetActivate(false);
00660 
00661         map.name = hud.pause.name->GetLabel();
00662         string saveFileName = MAPS_DIR + tools::UnixName(map.name) + ".bld";
00663 
00664         if(!map.name.empty())
00665         {
00666             map.spawnPoints.clear();
00667 
00668             for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_visualSpawnPoints.size(); i++)
00669                 map.spawnPoints.push_back(m_visualSpawnPoints[i]->GetPos());
00670 
00671             if(m_editSetting.createNew)
00672             {
00673                 manager.level->SaveLevel(saveFileName);
00674             }
00675 
00676             else
00677             {
00678                 manager.level->SaveLevel();
00679 
00680                 std::rename(manager.level->GetOpenFileName().c_str(), saveFileName.c_str());
00681             }
00682 
00683             manager.app->globalSettings.ReadMapInfo();
00684             manager.app->UpdateGuiContent();
00685 
00686             hud.pause.status->SetEnable(true);
00687             hud.pause.status->Write("Carte enregistrer !");
00688         }
00689 
00690     }
00691     else if(hud.pause.ret->IsActivate())
00692     {
00693         manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(true);
00694         manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(false);
00695 
00696         m_timeTo = VIEW;
00697     }
00698 }
00699 
00700 void EditorManager::EventProcess()
00701 {
00702     EventManager* event = manager.gameEngine->GetEventManager();
00703 
00704     manager.gameEngine->PollEvent();
00705 
00706     if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00707     {
00708         if(event->lastActiveKey.first == EventManager::KEY_ESCAPE)
00709         {
00710             manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(false);
00711             manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(true);
00712 
00713             m_timeTo = PAUSE;
00714         }
00715     }
00716 
00717     switch(m_timeTo)
00718     {
00719         case EDIT:
00720             EditEventPorcess(event);
00721             break;
00722 
00723         case VIEW:
00724             ViewEventPorcess(event);
00725             break;
00726 
00727         case PAUSE:
00728             GuiEventPorcess(event);
00729             break;
00730     }
00731 }
00732 
00733 inline string skyTexBaseName(const Texture& tex)
00734 {
00735     string filename = tex.GetFilename();
00736 
00737     unsigned pos = filename.find_last_of('\\');
00738 
00739     if(pos == string::npos)
00740         pos = filename.find_last_of('/');
00741 
00742     return filename.substr(pos + 1);
00743 }

00745 void EditorManager::HudProcess()
00746 {
00747     using namespace gui;
00748 
00749     stringstream info;
00750 
00751     info << "Curseur 3D : " << m_3dSelect << endl;
00752 
00753     info << endl;
00754 
00755     switch(m_navigation)
00756     {
00757         case ENTITY:
00758             info << "Entités" << endl;
00759 
00760             if(m_selectedNode)
00761                 info << "Selection : " << m_selectedNode->GetName() << " ; " << m_selectedNode->GetPos();
00762             else
00763                 info << "Selection : NULL";
00764 
00765             if(m_completeHelp)
00766             {
00767                 info << endl;
00768                 info << "Statiques :" << endl
00769                         << "S   : Séléction" << endl
00770 
00771                         << "Dynamiques :" << endl
00772                         << "D+J : Jumper" << endl
00773                         << "D+T : Teleporter" << endl
00774 
00775                         << "Items :" << endl
00776                         << "T+L     : Santé" << endl
00777                         << "T+A     : Munnition" << endl
00778                         << "T+S     : Super-life" << endl
00779                         << "T+F     : Fata-shot" << endl
00780                         << "T+I     : Arme Finder" << endl
00781                         << "T+H     : Arme Shotgun" << endl
00782                         << "T+B     : Arme Bomb" << endl
00783                         << "C       : Cloner" << endl
00784                         << "Suppr   : Supprimer" << endl;
00785 
00786                 info << "Mouvements :" << endl
00787                         << "SHIFT       : Déplacement X, Z" << endl
00788                         << "SHIFT+ALT   : Déplacement Y" << endl
00789                         << "SHIFT+F     : Au sol" << endl
00790                         << "SHIFT+G     : Aligner. Grille" << endl
00791                         << "SHIFT+[AE]  : Rotation X" << endl
00792                         << "SHIFT+[QD]  : Rotation Y" << endl
00793                         << "SHIFT+[WC]  : Rotation Z" << endl;
00794 
00795             }
00796 
00797             hud.entity.info->Write(info.str());
00798             break;
00799 
00800         case LIGHT:
00801             info << "Lumieres";
00802 
00803             if(m_completeHelp)
00804             {
00805                 info << endl;
00806                 info << "Création lumiers" << endl
00807                         << "P   : Ponctuelle" << endl
00808                         << "D   : Dirictionelle" << endl;
00809 
00810                 info << "Config. lumiers" << endl
00811                         << "SHIFT       : Déplacement X, Z" << endl
00812                         << "ALT+SHIFT   : Déplacement Y" << endl
00813                         << "Suppr       : Supprimer";
00814             }
00815 
00816             hud.light.info->Write(info.str());
00817             break;
00818 
00819         case SKYBOX:
00820             info << "Skybox";
00821 
00822             if(m_sky)
00823             {
00824                 Texture* skyTex = m_sky->GetTextures();
00825 
00826                 info << endl
00827                         << "Devant: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[0]) << endl
00828                         << "Derierre: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[1]) << endl
00829                         << "Haut: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[2]) << endl
00830                         << "Bas: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[3]) << endl
00831                         << "Gauche: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[4]) << endl
00832                         << "Droite: " << skyTexBaseName(skyTex[5]);
00833             }
00834 
00835             hud.sky.info->Write(info.str());
00836             break;
00837 
00838         case FOG:
00839             info << "Brouiallrd (Fog)";
00840 
00841             hud.fog.info->Write(info.str());
00842             break;
00843 
00844         case MUSIC:
00845             info << "Musique" << endl
00846                     << "Espace  : Lancer/Arreter la musique" << endl
00847                     << "Suppr   : Désactiver la musique pour la carte";
00848 
00849             if(map.musicStream)
00850                 info << endl << ">> " << map.musicPath;
00851 
00852             hud.music.info->Write(info.str());
00853             break;
00854     }
00855 }
00856 
00857 void EditorManager::Render()
00858 {
00859     EventManager* event = manager.gameEngine->GetEventManager();
00860 
00861     switch(m_timeTo)
00862     {
00863         case VIEW:
00864             manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_VIEW);
00865             break;
00866         case EDIT:
00867             switch(m_navigation)
00868             {
00869                 case ENTITY:
00870                     manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_EDIT_ENTITY);
00871                     break;
00872                 case LIGHT:
00873                     manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_EDIT_LIGHT);
00874                     break;
00875                 case SKYBOX:
00876                     manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_EDIT_SKYBOX);
00877                     break;
00878                 case FOG:
00879                     manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_EDIT_FOG);
00880                     break;
00881                 case MUSIC:
00882                     manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_EDIT_MUSIC);
00883                     break;
00884             }
00885             break;
00886         case PAUSE:
00887             manager.gui->SetSession(EDITOR_GUI);
00888             break;
00889     }
00890 
00891     manager.gameEngine->BeginScene();
00892 
00893     if(manager.app->globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00894     {
00895         Rtt* rtt = manager.ppe->GetRtt();
00896 
00897         rtt->Use(true);
00898         rtt->Clear();
00899         manager.scene->Render();
00900         rtt->Use(false);
00901 
00902         m_3dSelect = manager.scene->ScreenToWorld(event->mousePos, rtt);
00903 
00904         manager.ppe->Render();
00905     }
00906     else
00907     {
00908         manager.scene->Render();
00909         m_3dSelect = manager.scene->ScreenToWorld(event->mousePos);
00910     }
00911 
00912     manager.gui->Render();
00913 
00914     manager.gameEngine->EndScene();
00915 }
